unnormalised: My grandmother, Amma, swears by Ayurveda! She used to get treated at Kottakkal Arya Vaidya Sala in Kerala every year. Remember that Onam we spent there, enjoying the sadhya after her Panchakarma? She says it helped her with her knee pain, better than any Rs. 5000 doctor's visit in Bangalore. She even walks 2 km daily now. I'm thinking of trying it myself next Diwali for stress relief.
